metadata.name: New Github Organization Member Added
metadata.comment: Detects when a new member is added or invited to a github organization.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_finding WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(LOWER(action)) in ('org\.add_member', 'org\.invite_member'))

output.summary: Detects when a new member is added or invited to a github organization.

metadata.objective: False positive: Organization approved new members Reference: https://docs.github.com/en/organizations/keeping-your-organization-secure/managing-security-settings-for-your-organization/reviewing-the-audit-log-for-your-organization#dependabot_alerts-category-actions
